markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twinned Defense (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=425) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 153 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57) (Level 18)

**Prerequisites**
[Twin Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=377)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand.

</column>

---

You’re always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you. While you are in this stance, you constantly gain the benefits of the Twin Parry action.
name: Twinned Defense (Fighter)
requirement: You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand.
